Description: Postcard; printed paper; colour photograph showing various views of Cairo (clockwise from the top left): a mosque, the Sphinx at Giza, city centre, a Coptic church, a mosque and a bridge over the river Nile.
Curator's comments: Modern card; postally used; postmarked 12th October 1994; the message reads: "Dear Gladie, I hope you had not already had the same card as the types are limited. I am in Cairo, its 37 degrees C hot dusty & noisey [sic]. My bedroom looks over the Nile (dirty brown water). Just come from Kenya - tired & want to go home. See you soon, Tim xx ". The sender and recipient are the same as EPH-ME 4635 but the trip appears to be a diiferent one.
Associated names: Named in inscription: Mrs G Mason
